addTransactionPage.title: Add Transaction
addTransactionPage.subtitle: Add all types of transactions: income, expenses, donations, etc.

recurringTransaction.tooltip: Check if this is a transaction that repeats regularly.
recurringTransaction.explanation: When setting up a recurring transaction, the system will save the definition but will not create an immediate transaction. Transactions will be generated automatically on the defined dates (e.g., on the 1st of each month).

exemptIncome.label: Exempt from Ma'aser?
exemptIncome.tooltip: Check if this income is not subject to ma'aser at all (e.g., certain gifts, expense reimbursements).

chomesh.label: Calculate Chomesh (20%)?
chomesh.tooltip: Check if this income requires setting aside 20% instead of 10%.

recognizedExpense.label: Recognized Expense for Ma'aser?
recognizedExpense.tooltip: Check if this is an expense recognized for deduction from ma'aser-obligated income (10% of the expense will be deducted from the debt).

personalFunds.label: Donation from Personal Funds?
personalFunds.tooltip: Check if this donation is given from personal funds and should not reduce the ma'aser balance.

actions.donateTooltip: The donation to the institute and Ten10 can be from ma'aser funds

amount.positive: Amount must be greater than zero

description.maxLength: Description can contain up to 100 characters

category.maxLength: Category can contain up to 50 characters

recipient.maxLength: Recipient name can contain up to 50 characters
recipient.requiredForDonation: Recipient name is required for donations

chomesh.notForExempt: Chomesh cannot be selected for exempt income
chomesh.onlyForIncome: Chomesh is relevant only for income

dayOfMonth.number: Day of month must be a number
dayOfMonth.integer: Day of month must be an integer
dayOfMonth.range: Day of month must be between 1 and 31
dayOfMonth.requiredForMonthly: Day of month must be specified for monthly recurring transactions
dayOfMonth.onlyForRecurring: Day of month cannot be set for non-recurring transactions

totalOccurrences.number: Total occurrences must be a number
totalOccurrences.integer: Total occurrences must be an integer

frequency.required: Frequency must be selected for recurring transactions
